# CodinIT

> Learn how to build, deploy, and edit full-stack applications with CodinIT.dev. Open-source AI app builder powered by e2b.dev sandboxes.

## Documentation Sets

- [CodinIT](https://docs.codinit.dev/llms-full.txt): Learn how to build, deploy, and edit full-stack applications with CodinIT.dev. Open-source AI app builder powered by e2b.dev sandboxes.

## Landing

- [Docs](https://docs.codinit.dev): Create full-stack web applications using natural language. No coding expertise required. Deploy instantly with custom domains using CodinIT.dev.

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://docs.codinit.dev/getting-started): Build real web apps fast using natural language with CodinIT - an AI-powered platform for creating full-stack applications
- [Quickstart](https://docs.codinit.dev/getting-started/quickstart): Get up and running with CodinIT in minutes. Learn the essential workflow for building, editing, and deploying your first application.
- [Teams](https://docs.codinit.dev/getting-started/teams): Collaborate on your app in real time with teammates using CodinIT's powerful workspace features
- [Developer Docs](https://docs.codinit.dev/getting-started/developer-docs): Framework-specific prompting strategies for Next.js, Python, Gradio, and Streamlit development. Accelerate your development with proven AI prompts.
- [Github](https://docs.codinit.dev/integrations/github)
- [Anthropic](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/anthropic): Learn how to configure and use Anthropic Claude models with CodinIT. Covers API key setup, model selection, and advanced features like prompt caching.
- [DeepSeek](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/deepseek): Learn how to configure and use DeepSeek models like deepseek-chat and deepseek-reasoner with CodinIT.
- [Gemini](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/gemini): Learn how to connect Google Gemini AI models to your CodinIT projects. Get access to powerful AI capabilities with simple setup and configuration.
- [xAI Groq](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/groq): Complete guide to integrating Groq models with CodinIT.dev for intelligent app development with real-time capabilities.
- [Mistral](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/mistral): Complete guide to integrating Mistral AI models with CodinIT.dev for precise code generation and multilingual development.
- [Ollama](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/ollama): Complete guide to integrating Ollama local AI models with CodinIT.dev for privacy-first development.
- [OpenAI](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/openai): Complete guide to integrating OpenAI GPT models with CodinIT.dev for AI-powered application development.
- [Vertex AI](https://docs.codinit.dev/models/gcp-vertex-ai): Complete guide to integrating Google Cloud Vertex AI with CodinIT.dev for enterprise-grade AI development.
- [TogetherAI](https://docs.codinit.dev/providers/togetherai): Learn how to connect Together AI to your CodinIT projects. Get access to the best open-source AI models with transparent pricing and fast performance.
- [Fireworks AI](https://docs.codinit.dev/providers/fireworks): Configure Fireworks AI with CodinIT to access ultra-fast inference of leading open-source AI models including Llama 3.1, Mixtral, Code Llama, and more.
